sentences.english: But probably the most familiar form of miniaturization is the dollhouse .
sentences.chinese: 也许大家最熟悉的袖珍艺术的形式还是玩具屋吧。

sentences.english: A good dictionary is always readable, like the P. O. D.
sentences.chinese: 好的字典和袖珍牛津字典，都是颇堪一读的。

sentences.english: Pocket editions of the constitution are a must-have accessory for politicians.
sentences.chinese: 政客们随身携带必备的袖珍版宪法。

sentences.english: Can you believe these lovely miniature food are not to be eaten?
sentences.chinese: 你相信这些可爱的袖珍“食物”其实是不能吃的吗？

sentences.english: But there was barely enough spark to light up a pocket flashlight.
sentences.chinese: 但几乎没有足够的火花可以点亮一个袖珍手电筒。

sentences.english: The smallest dog in history was a tiny Yorkie from Blackburn, England.
sentences.chinese: 历史上最小的狗来自英国黑坂的袖珍尤克。

sentences.english: He was enthusing about his new pocket cassette recorder.
sentences.chinese: 他对自己的新袖珍录音机爱不释手。

sentences.english: This is your pocket guide, though it won't fit in anything except your cargo pants.
sentences.chinese: 虽是袖珍指南，却无处可放，除了休闲裤。

sentences.english: His son was a pocket edition of himself.
sentences.chinese: 他的儿子简直就是他的袖珍版。

sentences.english: Cased Pocket Revolver, . 28 Caliber, Massachusetts Arms Co. , Massachusetts Arms Co. , Chicopee Falls, MA.
sentences.chinese: 袖珍左轮手枪，28口径，马萨诸塞州武器公司。

sentences.english: I I have a pocket diary. ;
One handy example is the replacement of the slide rule by the pocket calculator .
sentences.chinese: 一个简便的事例是用袖珍计算器代替计算尺。

sentences.english: But you are the best pocket camera on the market.
sentences.chinese: 但你是市场上最好的袖珍相机。

sentences.english: A miniature sound-level meter is devised.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种袖珍声级计。

sentences.english: Photos must be stuck on all of the 2 folios .
sentences.chinese: 照片必须坚持对所有的2个袖珍。

definition: mini (as in mini-skirt or Mini Cooper) (loanword)
The sparrow may be small but all its vital organs are there (idiom)./small but complete in every detail
pinyin: ma2 que4 sui1 xiao3 , wu3 zang4 ju4 quan2
